data.name: Orgynizer Demo
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to the ORGYNIZER Demo, a small tease to show you how the game operates.

The Demo is limited to the first five levels, but still have full procedurally generated challenges, highscores and anything you might find in the full game within those five levels.
data.about_the_game:
Welcome to the ORGYNIZER Demo, a small tease to show you how the game operates.

data.short_description: Welcome to the ORGYNIZER Demo, a small tease to show you how the game operates. The Demo is limited to the first five levels, but still have full procedurally generated challenges, highscores and anything you might find in the full game within those five levels.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 7 (32/64-bit)/Vista/XP
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Processor or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 8600 / Radeon equivalent
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 7 (32/64-bit)
  • Processor: Pentium 4 processor (3.0GHz, or better)
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 8600 / Radeon equivalent
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains no actual pornographic content.

This game is not meant as any criticism or ridicule of people that enjoy various sexual adventures. It is merely built as a silly puzzle game, using some colorful (and fictional) characters.
